title: The Polyphonic Spree - 4 Albums (Apple Lossless)
description:
This pack contains direct cd rips of the albums "The Beginning Stages of..." & "Live At Austin Texas" as well as the "Wait EP" and the bonus disc from "The Beginning Stages of..." from the Choral-symphonic Pop band "The Polyphonic Spree". These albums were ripped from the cd to the format Apple Lossless (.m4a) to maintain lossless audio quality and playback. The format is easily converted to .flac for anyone that doesnt use iTunes.
